column4: if i put a program in /etc/init.d/ will it run every time i execute the programs name in a shell?
it will execute every time the computer starts
where do i put my program if i just want to be able to run it like program_name in a shell instead of having to navigate to a directory and ./program_name
in your $PATH - you can create a directory in your /home called 'bin' and put the program there
